Class Hangman

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Hangman
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Hangman
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This Hangman class is a class that have the methods and the logic for the basic hangman game. The code for this class is inspired by the following website: http://www.cs.jhu.edu/~joanne/cs107/code/StaticMethods/hangmanMethods.java This version of hangman however do not detect whether the user have input the same letters in the guess
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • MAXPARTS

        private final int MAXPARTS
        MAXPARTS is a final instance variable of type int that stores the maximum number of tries for the Hangman game
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • secret

        private java.lang.String secret
        secret is an instance variable of type String that stores the secret word/the word to be guessed

      • output

        private java.lang.StringBuffer output
        output is an instance variable to type StringBuffer that stores the output to show the user after every guess

      • bodyparts

        private int bodyparts
        bodyparts is an instance variable of type int that stores the number of bodyparts left after each guess. the initial default value is MAXPARTS.

      • done

        private boolean done
        done is an instance variable of type boolean that stores the value whether the game has ended. It will be set to true if it has and vice versa

      • guess

        private java.lang.String guess
        guess is an instance variable of type String that stores the user's guess whether it is a letter of a word

      • guesses

        private java.lang.String guesses
        guesses is a string that stores all the letters of that have been guessed

      • letter

        private char letter
        letter of type char stores the letter the user have guessed

      • win

        private boolean win
        win stores the a true value if the player won or vice versa

        secret - the word to be guessed by the player

        Returns:
        the boolean value in win

      • startHangman

        public void startHangman(java.lang.String input)
        this method is called each time after a player has entered their guess. the method first check whether the input from user is a word or a letter. If it is a word, the method will check to see if the word matches the secret word. If the player has guessed correctly, then the instance variable win will be set to true to indicate the user has win and vice versa. Then it will set the value of done to true to indicate that the game has ended if the user has input a letter, the method will check whether the letter contains in the word and the letter will be added to the instance variable guesses. If the letter is not contained in the word, the instance variable bodyparts will be decremented. If yes, then the method will call the method matchLetter to generate the outuput to be shown to the user. Then the method will check whether the game has ended. If yes the value win will be set to false. The method will also checks whether the output is equal to the secret word(check whether all letters have been guessed). If yes, the value win will be set to true
        Parameters:
        input - the user's guess

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()
        This method returns checks whether the game is done by checking whether the bodyparts left of the hangman is equal to 0
        Returns:
        true if bodyparts is equal to 0

      • matchLetter

        private static void matchLetter(java.lang.String secret,
                                java.lang.StringBuffer output,
                                char letter)
        This static method will called when the user's letter matches a letter in the word. it will expose the letters guessed in the output
        Parameters:
        secret - the word to be guessed
        output - the output for the user
        letter - the letter guessed by the user

      • makeOutput

        private static java.lang.StringBuffer makeOutput(java.lang.String secret)
        This static method generates dashes for the secret word when the hangman games starts
        Parameters:
        secret - the word to be guessed by user
        Returns:
        the new output of type StringBuffer
